ECSchema.description: Base schema for the Road and Rail domains.

ECEntityClass.description: A long, narrow physical stretch specially constructed for a particular travel type.

Source.roleLabel: may be refered to by N Pathways

ECEntityClass.description: A Pathway with a smoothed or paved surface, made for traveling by motor vehicle, carriage, etc.
A Pathway with a track or set of tracks along which passenger and freight trains run.
Base class for segments of a Travelway, which is the contiguous spatial portion of a Pathway in direct contact with the moving objects.
Travelway segment with a constant definition.

Source.roleLabel: is referred to by N segments

ECEntityClass.description: Travelway segment with a variable Travelway definition.

Source.roleLabel: is assembled by 1 pathway

ECEntityClass.description: Base class for a set of physical layers providing structural support to the Travelway.
A segment of a Travelway structure with a constant definition.

Source.roleLabel: is referred to by N segments

ECEntityClass.description: A segment of a Travelway structure along an intersection with another.

Base class for a Set of physical elements, with their corresponding structural layers, along the side of a Travelway, providing different purposes (e.g. separation, safety, connections to existing terrain, etc).
Generic class for Road/Rail end-condition elements.

Source.roleLabel: is referred to by N segments

ECEntityClass.description: Physical segment of a Travelway connected to an intersection between alignments.

Source.roleLabel: refers to 1 intersection

Target.roleLabel: is referred by zero or more intersection legs

ECEntityClass.description: Physical segment of the Travelway of a road connected to an intersection.

Source.roleLabel: is referred to by N segments

ECEntityClass.description: Base class for Physical intersections driven by alignments.
Base class for Physical road intersections.
Physical road crossing-intersection.
Physical road branching-intersection.
Physical road roundabout.
Physical tunnel which a segment of a road or rail go through.
Generic Physical Element that is linearly located.
Base class for a linearly-located array of physical elements.
Generic linearly-located array of physical element.
Physical type for generic furniture elements. Template graphics expected to be stored in a related bis:TemplateRecipe3d.
Physical type identifying Guard-Rail. Graphics may optionally be stored in a related TemplateRecipe3d.
TemplateRecipe that generates graphics by repeating a GeometryPart, in between a start and end parts.

encapsulates 1 part
encapsulates 1 part
encapsulates 1 part

ECEntityClass.description: TemplateRecipe that generates graphics by dropping a GeometryPart along a linear-path.
TemplateRecipe that generates graphics by creating a volume from a GeometryPart applied on an Area.
UniqueAspect to be applied to Physical Elements whose status needs to be tracked.
Attribution element enabling linearly-referenced Status assignment.

Source.roleLabel: are about 1 physical element
is owned by 1 element

ECEntityClass.description: UniqueAspect to be applied to Physical Elements to hold general cached-data.

ECProperty.description: Json string containing derived properties, typically computed by an EGA
